/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, adding a touch of urban greenery to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
